alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 6:48AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect Hancock...southwestern Washington...southern Piscataquis and southwestern Penobscot Counties... At 648 AM EST...An area of heavy snow was along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Blanchard to 6 miles northwest of Bar Harbor... and moving northeast AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Bangor, Old Town, Ellsworth, Bar Harbor, Bucksport, Dover-Foxcroft, Dexter, Newport, Blue Hill, Greenville, Guilford, Howland, Cherryfield, Brownville Junction, Orono, Brewer, Hampden, Hermon, Corinth and Milo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 157 and 218. US Highway 1 between Orland and Gouldsboro, and near Cherryfield. State Highway 11 between Newport and Brownville Junction. State Highway 9 between Dixmont and Junction 193. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. * Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
